title: Riot fix your game please
body: Riot i just tried to queue up with my friends to a game and when we got into a game i alt+tabbed to look at my facebook while i wait for the game to load. When i alt+tabbed to check if the game has started, nothing pops up. so i click the icon on the start bar and nothing pops up. after many attempts still nothing. i couldnt even turn the stupid game off so i reopened a new league client and tried to reconnect and now it says ive tried to join a gam in an unofficial way by not clicking the play button or joining a match and when the reconnect button finally pops up, they remade and now i have a stupid priority queue. RIOT PLEASE FIX YOUR GAME OR MAKE ONE PROPERLY. YOU GUYS GOT DDOSED AND SHIT YESTERDAY SO GET YOUR SHIT TOGETHER.
